channel.title: TV on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in TV on 2D Steve

item.title: I'm am Vengeance, I am the Night, I am Batman!
item.description: Ashley, Steph, and I have spent the last few hours watching Batman: The Animated Series, and I am having an absolute blast with it.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: I saw the new AMC series, The Walking Dead, last night.

item.title: A Little Less Conversation
item.description: I just watched 80’s star Dolph Lundgren sing an Elvis song and smash a bunch of stuff on some crazy show.

item.title: Who Dat?!
item.description: Today was Super Bowl XLIV. That’s Super Bowl 44 for those not so “up” on the old school Roman numerals.
